sub_fields.label: Wrapper Element
sub_fields.name: wrapper_element
sub_fields.instructions: Wrap this block of content in an optional wrapper element.

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Element CSS Class
sub_fields.name: wrapper_element_class
sub_fields.instructions: Add optional CSS classes, separated with a single space, to this block's wrapper element.

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Element ID
sub_fields.name: wrapper_element_id
sub_fields.instructions: A unique ID attribute to assign to this block's wrapper element.

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Element Custom Attributes
sub_fields.name: wrapper_element_attrs
sub_fields.instructions: Specify any custom HTML attributes to add to the wrapper element.

sub_fields.label: Sidebar Position
sub_fields.name: sidebar_position
sub_fields.instructions: Select which side of the two column layout that the sidebar (narrower column) should be positioned.

sub_fields.label: Sidebar Content
sub_fields.name: sidebar_content
sub_fields.instructions: Choose what type of content to add to the sidebar.

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Element
sub_fields.name: wrapper_element
sub_fields.instructions: Wrap this block of content in an optional wrapper element.

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Element CSS Class
sub_fields.name: wrapper_element_class
sub_fields.instructions: Add optional CSS classes, separated with a single space, to this block's wrapper element.

sub_fields.label: Wrapper Element ID
sub_fields.name: wrapper_element_id
sub_fields.instructions: A unique ID attribute to assign to this block's wrapper element.

sub_fields.label: Section
sub_fields.name: section
sub_fields.instructions: Select an existing Section.

sub_fields.label: Section CSS Class
sub_fields.name: section_class
sub_fields.instructions: Add optional CSS classes, separated with a single space, to this Section's outermost element.

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: A unique ID to apply to this Section's outermost element.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Custom link text to use in automated subnavigation menus, if the Automatic Section Menus Plugin is activated and being used on this page.  Is also applied to the ARIA label for this Section's outermost element.

sub_fields.label: Spotlight
sub_fields.name: spotlight
sub_fields.instructions: Select an existing Spotlight.

fields.label: Lead Text
fields.name: page_lead_text
fields.instructions: Optional lead text to display immediately above the two column content on this page.

fields.label: Sidebar Contents
fields.name: sidebar_content
fields.instructions: Select one or more types of content to add to the sidebar on this page.

sub_fields.name: section
